articles.description: Canon EOS C300 Mark III comes with a high-dynamic-range by adopting a newly-developed Dual Gain Output (DGO) sensor.
articles.content:
Canon announces a new digital cinema camera in India.
Japanese major Canon on Tuesday introduced its new digital cinema camera EOS C300 Mark III in India. The camera is expected to go on sale in July and the company is yet to disclose its price.
